com.vtls.opensource.utilities
Class XMLUtilities

java.lang.Object
  com.vtls.opensource.utilities.XMLUtilities

public class XMLUtilities
extends Object

A collection of utility functions for the XML JDOM Document.

getNodeByXPath

public static Object getNodeByXPath(org.jdom.Document _document,
                                    String _xpath,
                                    String prefix,
                                    String uri)
                             throws org.jdom.JDOMException
Capsulate namespace prefix and URI to the XPath, evaluate the wrapped XPath expression and returns the first entry in the list of selected nodes.

Parameters:
_document - the JDOM Document
_xpath - A string of a specific XPath expression
prefix - A string of the namespace prefix
uri - A string if the namespace URI
Returns:
An Object of the single selected node
Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException - If a JDOM error occurs
